name: v1.31.0
body:
## What's Changed
* RUNTIME UPGRADE: go runtime go1.24.0 → go1.25.7 [tests/integration_tests/helloV2] by @campaigner-prod[bot] in https://github.com/DataDog/datadog-lambda-go/pull/225
* RUNTIME UPGRADE: go runtime go1.24.0 → go1.25.7 [tests/integration_tests/error] by @campaigner-prod[bot] in https://github.com/DataDog/datadog-lambda-go/pull/226
* DEPENDENCY UPGRADE: minor: github.com/DataDog/datadog-lambda-go, github.com/aws/aws-lambda-go · patch: gopkg.in/DataDog/dd-trace-go.v1 [tests/integration_tests] by @campaigner-prod[bot] in https://github.com/DataDog/datadog-lambda-go/pull/229
* chore: add note to migration instructions in new datadog-lambda-go readme by @happynancee in https://github.com/DataDog/datadog-lambda-go/pull/230
* Start tracer while initializing trace lambda listener by @shreyamalpani in https://github.com/DataDog/datadog-lambda-go/pull/222

## New Contributors
* @campaigner-prod[bot] made their first contribution in https://github.com/DataDog/datadog-lambda-go/pull/225
* @shreyamalpani made their first contribution in https://github.com/DataDog/datadog-lambda-go/pull/222

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/DataDog/datadog-lambda-go/compare/v1.30.0...v1.31.0
